item.title: Subconscious Reprogramming
item.description: Link:How To Reprogram Subconscious Mind: The one cycle that determines your fate (Dirty Secret) - YouTube - Brave Overall flow: Thoughts[Incoming/Outgoing] –> Emotion Emotions –> Belief Belief –> RAS ( Reticular Activating System ) RAS –> Confirmation Confirmation –> Conviction Thoughts and emotions switch between each other for some time to form belief. You don’t choose incoming thoughts: these happen and most of us subconsciously create emotion out of it; then switch back and forth between more thoughts and more emotions.
